Title: Authorizes Susan Gillinder, the widow of Robert C. Ritchie, to file a new service retirement application and election form with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Susan Gillinder, the widow of Robert C. Ritchie, to file a new service retirement application and an option election form on behalf of her deceased husband with the New York state and local employees' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Susan Gillinder, the widow of Robert C. Ritchie, to file a new service retirement application and option election form with the New York state and local employees' retirement system on behalf of such deceased member
